DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate therapeutic benefit safety intratympanic AM-101 injection comparison placebo treatment persistent acute inner ear tinnitus .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Single Versus Repeat Doses AM-101 Treatment Acute Inner Ear Tinnitus
DOC.criteria: Tinnitus follow acute acoustic trauma , acute otitis medium , middle ear surgery inner ear barotrauma ; onset less three month ago . Tinnitus completely maskable Fluctuating tinnitus Intermittent tinnitus Meniere 's Disease Ongoing acute chronic otitis medium otitis externa .
